opportunities.title: Westwoods Kids
opportunities.desc: Provides a fun, age appropriate learning environment for kids.

opportunities.title: Student Ministry
opportunities.desc: Provides students with a dynamic, fun, safe, environment where students are drawn into a deeper relationship with Jesus and others.

opportunities.title: College
opportunities.desc: Provides college students with a dynamic, fun, safe, environment where students are drawn into a deeper relationship with Jesus and others.

opportunities.title: Tech Team
opportunities.desc: Run all audio and visual elements of Sunday services
opportunities.time: Every Sunday morning and special events

opportunities.title: Green Room Team
opportunities.desc: Reaches out to new people at Westwoods, helping them get connected.

opportunities.title: Hospitality Team
opportunities.desc: Prepares coffee, donuts, and bagels to ensure a warm enjoyable experience

opportunities.title: Women’s Ministry (Women of Westwoods and Mom2Mom)
opportunities.desc: Conducts Bible studies with women of all ages. Each group meets bi-monthly.

opportunities.title: Greeter Team
opportunities.desc: Ensures that everyone’s first interaction is warm and inviting.

opportunities.title: Set-Up and Tear-Down Team
opportunities.desc: Makes sure the environment is prepared before and after services.

opportunities.title: Prayer Team
opportunities.desc: Fulfills a core value at Westwoods by praying for prayer request cards and providing prayer support during services
opportunities.time: Sundays and through out the week

opportunities.title: Worship Team
opportunities.desc: Facilitates musical worship material on Sunday services.

opportunities.title: Severe Weather Shelter Network
opportunities.desc: Provides emergency shelter during cold weather for people experiencing homelessness in our community. Shelter is open on nights below 32°F during the winter months

opportunities.title: Family Promise
opportunities.desc: Provides temporary housing and meals for families experiencing homelessness in our community. Westwoods provides short-term housing for 4 weeks during the year

opportunities.title: Food Rescue and Distribution (Joy’s Kitchen)
opportunities.desc: Rescues and distributes food for families in need in our community.
opportunities.time: Meets every Thursday 6pm-8pm and every other Saturday from 10am-1pm

opportunities.title: Administration Team
opportunities.desc: Helps with the logistical and organizational aspects of the church.
